Schenectady.Mohawk River State Park:
Mohawk River State Park is a 105-acre (0.42 km2) undeveloped state park in the town of Niskayuna in Schenectady County, New York. The park is located adjacent to the Mohawk River.


== History ==
Mohawk River State Park occupies the site of the former Schenectady Museum Nature Preserve.
